body.content:
We need the services of dedicated and hardworking people who are ready  
to work and travel around the world on a France cruise.

Salary ranges from €5,000 Euro per month and above.

Qualified Applicant Should Contact Us Immediately

- ACCOUNTING - BEAUTY SALON - CASINO - CRUISE STAFF - DECK - ENGINE -  
ENTERTAINMENT - FOOD AND BEVERAGE - GALLEY - GIFT SHOP - GUEST  
CONFERENCES - HOTEL - APARTMENT - HUMAN RESOURCES - PHOTO INSTRUCTIONS  
- PERSONAL INFORMATION SYSTEMS - PHOTO MECHANICAL INFORMATION -  
MEDICAL HAND - PHOTO - MEDICAL HAND - ACTIVITY DIRECTOR - JOCKEY DISC  
- NATURALIST - ACTIVITY STAFF - CLEANER - SECURITY - ADMINISTRATION -  
ENGINEERING - PHOTOGRAPHER - ONLINE RESERVATION AGENT - ENGINE ROOM  
STAFF - PRINTER BAR - STAFF - PRODUCTION DIRECTOR - BAR STAR -  
EXPEDITION LEADER - TRAINER - INSTRUCTOR - TRAINER - INSTRUCTOR -  
POCKET STAFF - BEAUTY / AESTHETICS - FOOD AND BEVERAGE STAFF - PUBLIC  
RELATIONS STAFF - BEDROOM MANAGER - BEDROOM MANAGER - BEDROOM STAFF  
RESTAURANT - CASINO STAFF - GIFT STORE STAFF - COOK - CUBA INSTRUCTOR  
- CHILD CARE INSTRUCTOR - WORKER D E CHILD CARE - CHILD CARE WORKER -  
CHILD CARE WORKER - CHILD WORKER - HOME CARE PERSONNEL - SINGER -  
COMPUTER SPECIALIST - READER - RESERVATION STAFF - CRUISE DIRECTOR -  
MAGICIAN - COUNSELOR - PERSONNEL CRUISES - MAITRE D - WATER SPORTS  
INSTRUCTOR - DANCER - ERAPIST MASSAGE - WAITRESS - DANCE INSTRUCTOR -  
GUEST SPEAKER - NURSE —DOCTOR—

 

VISA / WORK PERMIT FOR ANY QUALIFIED PERSON. VISA, ACCOMMODATION AND  
FLIGHT TICKET FEE WILL BE PAID BY THE COMPANY.

To apply, send your CV by email: _ccl.app@linuxmail.org_

In the subject line of the email write the POSITION you are applying  
for expedited application processing.
